CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 6, 1962, pg. 21, reads: "Discussing UP 'Spectacular' - Discussing some of the details of the 'Spectacular' show, which kicked off the 1962 United Fund campaign, was the above foursome, during a press interview last Saturday at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton. The Gulf Oil Corporation coordinated the components of the kick-off TV show.  Left to right: Walt Harper, co-director of the All Star Big Band; Daniel G. (Dan) Kean of Gulf's public relations staff; Pittsburgh's own Erroll Garner, one of the stars of the show, and Ray Kohler, manager, special projects of the Gulf public relations staff. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Walt Harper, Daniel "Dan" G. Kean, Erroll Garner, and Roy Kohler, Gulf Oil public relations, standing in Penn Sheraton Hotel discussing the United Fund campaign "Spectacular" show
